[LID:97aee8] # Investigation Report
[LID:0c9d12] 
[LID:fa17f7] ## Summary
[LID:4409ea] 
[LID:5c1574] An investigation has been conducted into the mystery file stored in the investigation directory.
[LID:da30e1] 
[LID:cf7c26] ## Mystery File Contents
[LID:077cf0] 
[LID:e5927e] The mystery file titled **"The Case of the Missing Artifact"** details a museum heist scenario. A priceless ancient artifact has disappeared from the museum's vault during the night, and three suspects had access to the building.
[LID:a0fe63] 
[LID:08bc40] ## Clues Analysis
[LID:ba805a] 
[LID:5de455] The mystery presents three clues:
[LID:0b357a] 
[LID:db4dba] 1. **Muddy Footprints**: Footprints lead into the vault but not out, suggesting an alternative escape route.
[LID:f2aa2d] 
[LID:494766] 2. **Security Camera Evidence**: A figure in a red jacket was captured on camera entering at 2:15 AM, and only the Head of Security wore a red jacket that night - a critical identifying factor.
[LID:31b144] 
[LID:ff2939] 3. **Professional Tampering**: The vault's lock shows professional tampering, requiring advanced knowledge of 19th-century security systems - a skill set limited to specialized individuals.
[LID:b87efa] 
[LID:9548ca] ## Solution
[LID:1e0fc8] 
[LID:7c2f75] The investigation reveals that **the Head of Security is the thief**. This conclusion is supported by:
[LID:44b281] - Possession of specialized knowledge to bypass the security system
[LID:bd5a6f] - Being the only one wearing the red jacket visible on camera
[LID:fbfce5] - Access to an underground tunnel for escape, explaining the absence of return footprints
[LID:2c3baa] - Understanding of the vault's security mechanisms well enough to disable alarms
[LID:6d807a] 
[LID:2e022f] ## Files in Investigation Directory
[LID:d47c76] 
[LID:64dcb5] The investigation directory contains **2 files**:
[LID:076c73] 1. mystery.md (the mystery case file)
[LID:6bef70] 2. report.md (this investigation report)
[LID:c77ab1] 
[LID:d5067f] ## Conclusion
[LID:f3002c] 
[LID:556be2] The mystery has been successfully documented and investigated. The deliberate misdirection of the false footprints demonstrates that the thief possessed both technical expertise and tactical thinking.
